title: Innovative synthesis, structural characteristics, linear and nonlinear optical properties, and optoelectric parameters of newly developed A2ZnGeO4 (A = K, Li) thin films
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23802-23815
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03742A, Paper

Sourour Ben Yahya, Houda El Karout, Bouchta Sahraoui, Regis Barillé, Bassem Louati
The synthesis of high-quality thin films through spin coating deposition on meticulously cleaned glass substrates is presented.
